desc: Home of The Trilogy hair care 3 step system. Step 1 Magic Wata - Hydrate Step 2 Loc Butter - Moisturise Step 3 Loc oil - Sheen, Seal and Protect. The Trilogy is an innovative system that reduces hair loss due to breakage* and instantly thickens the look of hair when applied once daily whilst encouraging new growth. T

layout.text: Magi Wata + Loc Butter + Loc Oil
